DOC.brief_title: Observational Prospective Study Success Single Embryo Transfer Implantation Related Level Follicular Fluid Cytokines Expression Low Responders Infertile Patients Treated With r-hLH add-on Therapy Second Controlled Ovarian Stimulation Cycle .
DOC.criteria: woman age < 38 year normal body mass index ( BMI ) 18 26 parameter ovarian reserve normal range ( day 3 FSH level < 10 mUI/ml ; day 3 E2 level < 80 pg/ml ; antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) level > 1.5 ng/ml ; AFC ( antral follicular count ) > 6 ) polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) ovarian surgery pelvic endometriosis POR accord ESHRE criterion
